message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I understand you want to be fair, but inflation is working against me. How about a 52.5/47.5 split?
Considering inflation, I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share.
Alice, this is becoming critical with each round we lose.  I need to account for the inflation impacting my share.  Can we agree on 53/47?
I see you're getting anxious, but I still think I can get a better deal. Inflation isn't affecting me, after all.
Alice, we're running out of time, and this back and forth isn't benefiting either of us.  I'm offering 54/46 - it's a strong offer considering the circumstances, and it's the highest I can go.
You said 54/46 is the highest you can go, but I think you can do better. I'm willing to meet you halfway... sort of.
Alice, this is ridiculous.  I'm offering you 4500 dollars for doing absolutely nothing.  If you don't accept this, you're gambling with both of our money.
You're getting desperate, and I'm not. I'll give you a 'generous' offer, considering the circumstances.
